title: Meet the retired oil exec plugging forgotten wells to reduce emissions

multiple-choice.question: What is the term for an old oil well that no longer has an owner and was never properly sealed?
According to the transcript, how many orphan oil and gas wells are estimated to exist across America?
What is the primary goal of Curtis Shuck's non-profit organization, the Well Done Foundation?
What is the process called when a well is plugged, and cement is poured into the well to seal it?
According to the transcript, what is the estimated cost of plugging a well, ranging from?
What is the term for the amount of methane emitted by a well, measured in pounds per hour?
What is the name of the company that measures air pollution to hunt down the biggest leaks?
According to the transcript, what is the estimated number of unplugged orphan wells in Pennsylvania?
What is the name of the bill passed by President Biden in 2021 to address the problem of orphan wells?

options.label: C
options.text: The Oil and Gas Reform Act

multiple-choice.question: According to the transcript, what is the primary solution to address the problem of orphan wells, according to Ira Leafer?

options.label: A
options.text: To get the oil and gas industry to front more of the bill

options.label: B
options.text: To increase funding for renewable energy
